title: Successful 14 day Ban Appeal
body: Recently received a 14 day suspension without any prior chat ban or warnings. I submitted and ticket and a Rioter looked into my situation and lowered the ban to a 10 game chat ban. I understand that I had conveyed some negative behavior in chat and I will improve my behavior on the rift. Just wanted to say I'm thankful and grateful for the Riot employee who helped me out. Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Tokishi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=j7rU3Ajt,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2019-10-30T08:51:40.696+0000)
>
> it's also permanent and can be brought up as evidence whether it happened a week ago or 10 years ago

Not true. The system lowers your penalty level after x time and y games (exact formula is unknown). If you play 300 games over months, and have one bad game thats not using ZT language and isnt bad enough to be manually reviewed, it will not push you over to a trigger. You arent going to get a game 5 years ago as evidence against you unless you took a 5 year break.

The same goes for punishment tiers; if you got a 10 chat restriction last year, and you played a reasonable amount of games til now, and just got another punishment of the chat variety, it would be another 10 game, not a 25 game.
